You are more than welcome to borrow any of the fanarts I hvae up at Hakubaikou.com or dev-art.   I dont' have a lot of Saitou standalone pieces, however, so I thought that might be an issue.  (Other than that oekaki, and the pic I did for Angrybee's marvelous fic which has my version of Tokio.)

I do think Saitou will be one of my next subjects and will of course let you guys know about that.  (But which one? PMK?  RK? whee!)



*
>It's not weird at all. I thought the same thing by the way he reacted to 
>her death. He couldn't even bear to be in the same room with her 
>body....which my little romance writing mind tends to perceive as 
>"something was between them even if it was never acknowledged or acted upon"


It could be overwhelming guilt and something not romantic.   But I like to think as you do regardless.   Or rather, I overthink ^_^
S
